The $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) laces of the $(this.details:default:descriptions:brief) for tying the garment closed at the waist.
The leather straps on the $(this.details:default:descriptions:brief) buckle around the calves for a decorated look.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "Skin-tight legwear featuring leather straps which buckle around the calves."
